faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the selling process work?
faq.a1: You send us your car's details, and if you accept, we arrange delivery and payment.
faq.q2: How long does the sale take?
faq.a2: The process can be completed the same day if you have all the documentation ready.
faq.a3: Title of ownership, official ID, and proof of address.

1.name: John Smith
1.text: I sold my car in one day, excellent service! The process was very simple and the payment immediate.

2.name: Anna Gomez
2.text: Very easy and fast, I recommend it. They helped me with all the paperwork and were very friendly.

3.name: Charles Ruiz
3.text: I was paid instantly and without complications. I would definitely sell them another car.

1.title: How to sell your car fast?
1.summary: Tips to sell your car safely and quickly.
1.content: Selling your car fast is possible if you follow these tips: prepare the documentation, keep your car clean, take good photos and get a quote with us for an immediate offer.

2.title: Documents needed for the sale
2.summary: List of documents you need to sell your car.
2.content: To sell your car you need: title of ownership, official ID, proof of address and, if applicable, original invoice. Contact us if you have questions!

3.title: Advantages of selling to Rodriguez te lo compra!
3.summary: Why choose us to sell your car.
3.content: With Rodriguez te lo compra! you get immediate payment, a safe process and no haggling. We take care of all the paperwork and pick up your car wherever you are.

whyChooseUs.title: WHY CHOOSE US?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: Your best option to sell your car, easy and safe.

benefit1.title: Any Car, Any Condition!
benefit1.desc: Old, damaged, running or not: we buy it. No matter its state.

benefit2.title: Instant Secure Payment
benefit2.desc: Get your money safely and instantly, right at pickup.

benefit3.title: FREE Pickup
benefit3.desc: We handle the towing at no extra cost. We schedule pickup where and when it suits you.

benefit4.title: Thousands of Satisfied Customers
benefit4.desc: Join our community. Discover why so many choose us for a stress-free sale.

process.title: Sell Your Car in 3 Simple Steps!
process.subtitle: Fast, Easy and 100% Hassle-Free.

step1.title: Instant Offer!
step1.desc: Complete our form in 90 seconds and receive a guaranteed offer.

step2.title: FREE Pickup
step2.desc: Accept the offer and schedule your car pickup wherever you are.

step3.title: Get Paid Instantly
step3.desc: Receive your full payment instantly, right when we pick up your vehicle.

hero.title: Sell your car easily, quickly and safely.
hero.subtitle: Get a quote and sell your car in minutes, no unnecessary paperwork.
